subject: Record retention Schedule;Categorisation and Weeding out of Records for ROs/ Field Units.
text: HRT4 744 THf xfetrot 2M9 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074201 (eti Wart 31_<rTHnf HATT4) 54 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0-5 Q 6, #ar-10, anrT, T Rarif-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/236/2012-Admin 17th March 2016 CIRCULAR Subject: Record retention Schedule; Categorization and Weeding out of Records for HQIROs/Field units Corrigendum 1 Reference record retention schedule, categorization and weeding out of records for NHAI HQ and ROs/Field Units issued vide policy circular No. 138/2014 dated 30.04.2014 and AF-149/2014 dated 30.09.2014 respectively. 2_ Para 3 i.e. Category C at page 1 of the circular may be read as: Category € "This category will include records of secondary importance and will have reference value of limited period of time not exceeding 10 years. These have been specified in Annuxure-2 In exceptional cases; if a particular record is required to be retained beyond 10 years, it will be upgraded to Category B The number following Category € in retention period column pertains to number of years for which the records is to be retained. For C-3, C-5 and C-10 means category € documents 10 beaeed for oryexzgnpley years and 10 years respectively. 3_ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. 6n1-2 (T. Chanda Biswas) GM (HR & Admn:)-IlI MOGM NHAL
